question: اگر $\left| \begin{matrix} a & 2a & a \\ 1 & 2 & -1 \\ 0 & 1 & a \\ \end{matrix} \right|=k$ باشد، حاصل $\left| \begin{matrix} 1 & a & 2a \\ -1 & 0 & 1 \\ 2 & 2a & -1 \\ \end{matrix} \right|$ کدام است؟
explanation: $\left| \begin{matrix} a & 2a & a \\ 1 & 2 & -1 \\ 0 & 1 & a \\ \end{matrix} \right|=0+1\times {{\left( -1 \right)}^{5}}\times \left| \begin{matrix} a & a \\ 1 & -1 \\ \end{matrix} \right|+a\times {{\left( -1 \right)}^{6}}\times \left| \begin{matrix} a & 2a \\ 1 & 2 \\ \end{matrix} \right|$ $=2a=k\Rightarrow a=\dfrac{k}{2}$ $\left| \begin{matrix} 1 & a & 2a \\ -1 & 0 & 1 \\ 2 & 2a & -1 \\ \end{matrix} \right|=\left( -1 \right)\times {{\left( -1 \right)}^{3}}\times \left| \begin{matrix} a & 2a \\ 2a & -1 \\ \end{matrix} \right|+0+1\times {{\left( -1 \right)}^{5}}\times \left| \begin{matrix} 1 & a \\ 2 & 2a \\ \end{matrix} \right|=-a-4{a}^{2}$ $\xrightarrow{a=\frac{k}{2}}-a-4{a}^{2}=-\frac{k}{2}-{k}^{2}$
